Question: Ali G Indahouse (2002) featured a cameo by this person, and the third film, Brüno, was released in 2009.
Hints: During the trip, this person acquires a Baywatch booklet at a yard sale and continues gathering footage for his documentary.
Staying at a bed-and-breakfast, this person and his producer are stunned to learn their hosts are Jewish.
In New York, this person sees an episode of Baywatch on television and immediately falls in love with Pamela Anderson.
